page.title: 16CARING DIPTFORD
page.content: {Riding}for the Disabled takes place every Monday at half past four until six o'clock. All the riders come from Dame Hannah Rodgers School, Ivybridge. It is a special school for{disabled}people. The oldest rider is 16 years old and the youngest is 11 years old. They have 18 adults, one to lead and two either side. One week they will go hacking and another week they will go in the field. There are six ponies, each pony is rode twice. Some children help with stable {management}and some ride. Many adults gladly give their time and help to give the disabled children a happy experience.
